thread.title: Hillary Clinton is following up tense Benghazi hearing with a (hopefully) friendlier chat with Jimmy Kimmel - US TV
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton is following up tense Benghazi hearing with a (hopefully) friendlier chat with Jimmy Kimmel - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Hillary Clinton is following up tense Benghazi hearing with a (hopefully) friendlier chat with Jimmy Kimmel - US TV
text: US presidential candidate Hillary Clinton has booked her next major chatshow appearance.The Democratic Party hopeful will join selfie buddy Jimmy Kimmel for a wide-ranging discussion set for ABC on Thursday, November 5. © Twitter / Jimmy KimmelJimmy Kimmel takes selfie with the Clintons This will be Clinton's first Jimmy Kimmel Live! sitdown of the campaign – although far from her first late-night appearance.Clinton is fresh off an interview with NBC's The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and a cameo on Saturday Night Live.The announcement of her appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live! came on the same day as Clinton faced hours of grilling on Capitol Hill over her handling of the Benghazi terror attack while serving as US Secretary of State.Meanwhile, Jimmy Kimmel Live! upped its own political content with an appearance from Clinton's Democratic rival Bernie Sanders last night.Republican candidate Donald Trump was booked for Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Tuesday as well, only to cancel at the last minute.
